headline: Lam Research Resets Technology Path With CEA Leti Deal And Boise Bet
summary: Lam Research announced a new partnership with research institute CEA-Leti focused on next generation specialty semiconductor technology. The company is reshaping its leadership team alongside this technology collaboration. Lam is expanding its US footprint with a new facility in Boise, Idaho, centered on advanced memory chip manufacturing near key customer Micron. These moves come as Lam Research (NasdaqGS: LRCX) trades at $249.48, with the stock up 3.9% over the past week and 11.9% over...
